definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)

sentences.english: In Mississippi, I think it’s changed from within.
sentences.chinese: 但在密西西比州，我認爲變化是由內而外的。

sentences.english: 5A dead sea turtle is washed ashore in Waveland, Mississippi.
sentences.chinese: 一隻被衝上密西西比州韋夫蘭岸邊的死海龜。

sentences.english: I was a dedicated student, and I had my heart set on going to USM.
sentences.chinese: 我是個執着的學生，一心想上南密西西比州大學。

sentences.english: The river has been setting records in places like Vicksburg in the state of Mississippi.
sentences.chinese: 密西西比州的維克斯堡河水也達創紀錄水平。

sentences.english: Other pets will soon be headed to Natchez, Mississippi, where the Humane Society of the United States announced it would help establish a temporary shelter.
sentences.chinese: 其他寵物將很快送往密西西比州的納齊茲。
密西西比州被稱爲“木蘭之州”。

pinyin: Lu4 yi4 si1 an1 na4 zhou1
